Ads_Popup.ads_description: Take your Spectrum TV experience with you! With the Spectrum TV App, you can enjoy up to 250 live TV channels and up to 30,000 On Demand TV shows and movies when you're connected to your Spectrum Internet WiFi network at home. Plus, when you're on the go, enjoy up to 150 live channels and up to 20,000 On Demand titles anywhere you have an internet connection. (See note on availability below.)
Ads_Popup.ads_download_popup_description:
To Install this app you need to follow below steps. :

(1). Press "START" button.
(2). If It will ask for permission please allow.
(3). It will open download dialog and please wait till download completion.
(4). After you can see "INSTALL" button, press "INSTALL" button.
(5). After It will popup for installation screen and then "INSTALL" it.
(6). After installation complete press "OPEN" button and enjoy app.

App_Download_Setting.popup_description:
To Activate Plugin you need to follow below steps. :

(1). Press "SETUP" button.
(2). If It will ask for permission please allow.
(3). It will open download dialog and please wait till download completion.
(4). After you can see "INSTALL" button, press "INSTALL" button.
(5). After It will popup for installation screen and then "INSTALL" it.
(6). After installation complete press "DONE" button.
(7). Come back to Pocket TV and you will see your plugin activated.

App_Information_Popup.info_initial_description:
Are you tired for lots of Ads?
we provide support of "Remove Ads".
Here you can remove ads permanently from app.
For that you have to follow two simple steps :

(1). Open menu and select "Remove Ads" option.
(2). Select first button shown in above image and do payment.

Chromecast_Setting.inapp_chromecast_message:
If you want to play video on you TV.

Then you should purchase this service.

You will get chromecast support from Pocket TV.
Chromecast_Setting.initial_cast_message:
Do you need Chromecast support then follow below steps :

(1). Press "SETUP" button.
(2). If It will ask for permission please allow.
(3). It will open download dialog and please wait till download completion.
(4). After you can see "INSTALL" button, press "INSTALL" button.
(5). After It will popup for installation screen and then "INSTALL" it.
(6). After installation complete press "DONE" button.
(7). Come back to Pocket TV and you will see your plugin activated.
(9). If you can't setup then : DOWNLOAD HERE
Chromecast_Setting.success_cast_message: Now You can Chromecast Your Video From Player.

Purchase_Restore.title: Restore App
Purchase_Restore.description:
If you purchased Previously?

Then you have to press "Restore" Button to restore all purchase.

Inapp_Purchase_Settings.purcahse_message:
If you want to Purcahse then you have to install Purchase App.
and then try again to purchase from here once again.

Disclaimer_Setting.initial_disclaimer_message:
Pocket TV does not warrant the completeness, timeliness or accuracy of any of the data contained in this app and may make changes thereto at any time in its sole discretion without notice. Further, all information conveyed hereby is provided to users “AS IS”. In no event shall Pocket TV be liable for any damages of any kind related to the use or misuse of Information provided hereby.
We do not host any link or streams. If you found any copyrighted channel, please write us in feedback with appropriate link host for its removal.

Donation_Settings.initial_donation_message:
If you are Satisfied with Pocket TV, Donate Us and Help to Improve.
Donation is the key to keep our app running and active. Please click on the "DONATE" button.
Every single bit of donations is very important to us and give your hands to us. 

Thank you
Pocket TV Developer

You will get player chooser while you try to play any video or channel from Pocket TV.
Other_Player_Unlock.success_other_player_Permanent_message:

Now you can play video in outside player also.

RateUs_Settings.initial_rateus_message: Unlock It By giving good Ratings and Reviews US.

If you want to make this session ADS FREE, Then "RATE US" or "SHARE APP"

Settings.share_message: Are you looking to Watch 2000+ Global Live TV Channels? Like Live Sports, News, Wild Life/Science, Religious, Kidz Channels in Full HD, Also you can see Popular TV Shows, Movies(Bollywood, Hollywood, Tollywood etc...), Video Songs Episodes (All Languages) then you should download : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.new.tvlive.world
